author: adagov.org
title: ₳GOV: Timelines and Treasury Data
description: Data about Cardano treasury and funds are distributed between multiple sources in multiple formats.
solution: Extend Project Catalyst data to include payouts, funds, voting statistics so that transactions from the treasury can be easily identified.
experience: 1 x Systems Engineering, 1 x Social Designer, 1 x Project Manager and Software Development Cooperative. Funded F4, F5, F6.
